item.description:
Doors open at 6:30 p.m. for this event, which will likely be a gorgeous evening of gospel music...
In the Bruyette Auditorium...the entrancce closer to West Hartford (as opposed to Hartford) is best, you park on the left near the chapel and walk to the courtyard...it is a gorgeous auditorium! Email me if need clarification!

From the flier:

The "Voices of Praise Choir at Saint Joseph College...Gospel Festival 2010," Featuring Troy Durden & Judah from Boston, MA, Soft Spoken Prophet from Springfield, PA, and College Choirs from CT & MA.

General admission is $5.00, Students with ID $2.00

More info: The Francis Driscoll Box Office @ 860 231 5555 or email VOP@SJS.EDU
----------------
St. Joseph College website has a great map, directions, etc.
http://www.sjc.edu/...
item.name: Voices of Praise Choir at Saint Joseph College
